item.title: Need help with a command! [SOLVED] [Mods Please Close]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:390172”] if (command.startsWith("hybridset")) { int[] items = {4091, 4903, 4675, 1704, 2550, 3105, 6568, 1079, 1127, 6889, 3101, 4587}; for(int i : items) { addItem(i, 1); } sM("To get barrage runes to ::barragelol. :p"); }
This is how I’d do it.[/quote]

I get 100 errors when I do that…

item.title: Need help with a command! [SOLVED] [Mods Please Close]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

        if (command.startsWith("hybridset")) {
            int[] items = {4091, 4903, 4675, 1704, 2550, 3105, 6568, 1079, 1127, 6889, 3101, 4587};
            for(int i : items) {
                addItem(i, 1);
            }
            sM("To get barrage runes to ::barragelol. :p");
        }

This is how I’d do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a command! [SOLVED] [Mods Please Close]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("hybridset")) { addItem(4091, 1); addItem(4093, 1); addItem(4675, 1); addItem(1704, 1); addItem(2550, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6568, 1); addItem(1079, 1); addItem(1127, 1); addItem(6889, 1); addItem(3101, 1); addItem(4587, 1); sM("To get barrage runes to ::barragelol. :p"); }

Pretty sure there isn’t an ‘s’ on “commands”, and I also removed "&& playerRights >= 0), because that is saying the same exact thing as if(commands.startsWith(“hybridset”)) {

item.title: Need help with a command! [SOLVED] [Mods Please Close]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I tried to add a command that gives a hybrid set. this is it-

if(commands.startsWith("hybridset") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4091, 1); addItem(4093, 1); addItem(4753, 1); addItem(4675, 1); addItem(1704, 1); addItem(2550, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6568, 1); addItem(1079, 1); addItem(1127, 1); addItem(6889, 1); addItem(3101, 1); addItem(4587, 1); sM("To get barrage runes to ::barragelol. :p"); }

This is the error I get -

Please don’t flame, I’m new to coding. xD

Also this is a 317 Delta.
